summary: Implements a high‑level, collection‑style wrapper for OGR vector layers, exposing Pythonic access to features, iteration, length, string representation and utilities such as spatial filtering, geometry conversion, and metadata extraction.
business_intent: Enable Django GIS developers to work with vector data through a simple, Pythonic API that abstracts GDAL/OGR complexities, facilitating feature manipulation, spatial queries, and integration of geographic data in web applications.
